Our Process

Step 1: Apply

Just fill out your details in the form above, and we'll send you through more information, give you a call to answer and questions and then send you through the full enrollment form

Step 2: Enroll

After we've answered any questions you might have, we'll send through the enrollment application. This takes around 15 - 20 minutes to fill in, and we'll get back to you within 48 hours to let you know if you have been accepted into the program

Step 3: Book

If you've been accepted into the program we'll send you through a link where you can formally book the course and pay a $250US deposit. As soon as we have received your deposit, we'll give you access to the pre-coursework containing exclusive video tutorials, help you start planning your portfolio and organise a payment plan for the remaining balance (you can pay upfront or in installments)

Step 1APPLY NOW

The Institute of Code

Institute of Code runs 10 day immersive coding bootcamps in beautiful locations around the world. We create an environment of accelerated learning, so you can learn in demand digital skills while having an experience of a lifetime.
